2.name: Professional Follow-up
2.body:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for your time earlier. I wanted to follow up on our discussion and share next steps.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

3.name: Interview Invitation
3.body:
Hello {{name}},

We reviewed your profile and would like to invite you for an interview. Please share your availability for this week.

Sincerely,
{{sender_name}}
